attributes.action: Ten YEARS in prison for those persecuting Pork eaters on “Religious” grounds.
attributes.additional_details: Our Police Forces must NOT be used to attack our democratic right to eat a bacon butty (Or any pork product) in a public place.
attributes.background: The persecution of people in this country who eat bacon butties or ANY pork products must stop. Those who take offence should not be able to take legal action against the use of Pork foods and those selling or eating them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. There is no law or policy that allows or encourages the "persecution of people in this country who eat bacon butties or any pork products", so we're not sure what specific action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking for a specific change in the law, if that's what you'd like to happen.
